name: Amazing Escape (Shareware)
description:
Amazing Escape is a strategy action game where the player needs to escape progressively more difficult mazes armed only with a flickering torch.  Exits can only be opened when all of the requisite keys have been found.

But it's not so simple...  in the dark labyrinth your heart starts to beat faster and faster as an ominous sound of stone scraping against stone gets louder.  You sense movement!  But flashing your torch only shows what you've already seen, except something is different...

The shareware version of Amazing Escape contains four challenging mazes.  A full version containing many more mazes -- and some little extras -- will be released soon!
